text: AWS enables us to focus on the
development of the application and we
have uh not a worry to our minds when it
comes to the delivery of that
application to the customer because the
uptime and the support that we get from
Amazon is magnificent my name is Maas
Aller I'm CEO at open and within open
I'm responsible for business development
for finance and for Risk Management Open
is the first technology company in the
world to have created from scratch uh a
new core banking application that's
entirely delivered to customers uh by
using cloud services our platform
enables um our customers to offer mutual
fund and savings accounts to uh retail
investors and our software platform
currently
administrates close to 10 billion EUR in
assets for hundreds of thousands of
private investors in our uh previous
lives as retail Bankers we used to do
things the oldfashioned way we had our
Legacy software applications uh we ran
the software ourselves in our own
proprietary data centers and when we got
the opportunities to start all over we
wanted to take a more Innovative uh
approach and create the application from
scratch and choose the best way to
deliver the software to our clients and
in our view the best way uh in this day
and age to offer the service is by using
software as a service solutions when we
started in 2009 AWS was already a
Pioneer in in the cloud business they
had the largest scale uh the best
service we knew that scaling would uh
enable Amazon to give us continuous
innovation and also the the best prices
in in the market the more specific
things that we use currently are the
identity and exess management um
Services which are very useful to us we
use obviously the ec2 uh Services uh of
which the elastic load balancers are
very critical we also use all the
monitoring services that are provided so
cloudwatch is very important to us so
that we can U manage and monitor the
entire environment that we have in in
Ireland and uh lastly uh but not the
least of important things is the trusted
advisor uh service that AWS offers us it
helps us to uh configure our total
environment in the best possible way and
to get the best performance and the
lowest costs AWS uh enables us to deploy
our uh Services uh into a client
production environment in just a couple
of months um where normally would uh
require a year uh time to Market we have
been able to shorten that time to Market
to only 3 months in 2010 2011 when we
had to get our customer setup approved
by the Dutch Central Bank and AWS was
persistent and dedicated to helping
achieve namely approval by the Dutch
authorities that that our SAS solution
complied to all relevant rules and
regulations AWS has allowed us to focus
on what we do best and that's to develop
the application and to be the first uh
core banking provider in the world that
runs entirely uh in the cloud
[Music]
